solution_line_template: If there were {boy_girl_difference} fewer boys at camp, there would be the same number of both boys and girls or {total_people} - {boy_girl_difference} = <<{total_people}-{boy_girl_difference}={people_if_equal}>>{people_if_equal} people.
That means that there were {people_if_equal} / {equal_parts_divisor} = <<{people_if_equal}/{equal_parts_divisor}={number_of_girls}>>{number_of_girls} girls at the camp.
